sections.heading: metals recycler; purchase of regulated metals property; information required; duration; receipt
sections.text: (1) A secondary metals recycler shall maintain a record, either as a hard copy or electronically, of all purchase transactions in which the secondary metals recycler purchases regulated metals property.(2
